item.content:encoded:
Price: ₹ 999.00 - ₹ 598.00
(as of Jun 11,2021 08:50:52 UTC – Details)



Product Descriptions: Applicable models: Apple, Android 4-6.4 inch mobile phone Voltage and current: 5V/0.8A Battery capacity: 2000mah Charging time: 3.5H Working time : 8H Package List: gamepad *1 Charging cable*1 Silicone pad*2 Compatible with: PUBG, Knives Out, Fornite,Rules of Survival, Survivor Royale, Critical Ops, etc.Shooting mobile game. The fire controller can be flipped for easy operation of the screen Fire while moving, 4 fingers operate at the same time, faster than the enemy, giving you a better gaming experience The gamepad and the ignition controller are integrated to make your hand feel more comfortable. Pubg first assistant, four fingers to operate together, 0.01m response speed, fast shooting, fast moving,100% victory. Highly sensitive: Designed with human-like finger touch, it blends perfectly with the phone screen, and shoots quickly, allowing you to win the game. Built-in 2000 mAh battery: Fear of phone shutdown?Don’t worry, the Smars Gamepad emergency battery can avoid this problem. 360°Cooling fan: It can last for 8 hours, allowing the phone to cool down quickly, reducing power consumption and effectively protecting the phone.
